transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji boliye
Customer: Ji Pallavi baat kar rahi hu main India Mart se
Executive: Haan boliye
Customer: Okay mam aapne call kiya tha abhi customer care mein aap keh rahi hai ki India Mart se baat nahi ho rahi but mam hamare sare employees se aapse touch mein hi hai aapse to baat hoti rehti hai
Customer: Nahi aisa to kuch nahi kyuki dekhiye maine do baar ring kara hai to koi response nahi aaya mujhe
Executive: Main aapko Rahil bhi call kar rahe hain Aniket bhi call kar rahe hain maine bhi call kiya hai hum to aapse touch mein hi hai problem to ye hai na ki aapki jo complaints aayi hai pehle aap wo resolve karaiye na
Customer: Ji complaint aayi hai to aap log dekh lijiye na kyuki aapne mujhe date pe date diya hua hai
Customer: Sir bhi mujhe bol rahe the
Executive: Mam aapko aap ek baar dekhiye mam suniye suniye meri baat suniye agar kisi buyer ki koi complaint aati hai hamare paas theek hai buyer ne hame complaint kiya ki HR services ke sath humne ye product kharida tha is tarike ke issues hai to uske liye hamari separate team hai wo team aapko khud call karegi
Customer: Kyuki mujhe panic mat kariye mam mam aap panic kyu kar rahi hai aap aap aapke yaha pe sabhi bar bar incoming call karke panic kar rahe hain you don't have to panic aapka jo bhi complaint hai wo mutually hum resolve karate hain aapse bhi baat karenge buyer se bhi baat karenge dekhenge ki deal mein kahan pe confusion hui hai kahan pe dikkat hui hai wo problem solve kara di jayegi
Customer: Bilkul bilkul main bhi chahti hu wo solve ho jaye to mam to mam aap alag alag logo se baat karengi to usse kuch solution nahi hoga hamari jo jo team hai jo buyer ki complaint handle karti hai wo aapse baat karegi hum ye resolve karayegi
Customer: Ji
Executive: Theek hai ha baki aapko pata hi hoga ki kaun kaun si complaint aa rakhi hai aapke against
Customer: Samriddhi Samriddhi nahi dikh rahi hai
Executive: Aap ek kaam kijiyega na mujhe complaint ka screenshot bhej dijiyega na show hi nahi ho raha
Executive: Mam main bata de rahi hu ek hai company name is Samriddhi Saroj Enterprises
Customer: Haan to wo isme include ho gaya hai wo to alag alag hai na isliye
Customer: Hai na
Executive: Ji hai na
Executive: To yaha pe likha hai Samriddhi Saroj Enterprises Saroj Kumar Pandey inki ek complaint chal rahi hai theek hai
Customer: Haan haan main samajh rahi hu
Executive: Theek hai aapka kuch unhone kaha hai ki chemical kuch kharab tha ya fir kuch chemical ke liye unhone complaint kiya hua hai theek hai unka jo amount tha shayad 13000 ka amount tha
Customer: 13000 ka amount tha
Executive: 13000 total amount unka 14000 ka deal hai theek hai 1000 advance diya tha 13000 cash on delivery
Customer: Ji
Executive: Ye complaint resolve karaiye ye keh rahe hain ki unhone kuch aapne kuch duplicate chemical diya hai inko
Customer: Mam ye main bolna chah rahi thi kya unhone screenshot bhi diya hai kya
Executive: Mam koi screenshot to hame nahi diya hai
Customer: To unhone complaint mein likha hai ye
Executive: Bhaiya aaj subah complaint aayi hai 11:30 baje theek hai maine aapko bata diya theek hai ab ye complaint number bata sakti hai mam
Executive: Number ek minute number main dekh ke
Customer: Main check kar leti na kin ka hai
Executive: Mam ye to samriddhi main bata de rahi hu company ka naam hai samriddhi
Customer: Wo log buyer galat information dete hain aap ek kaam kijiyega usko resolve kijiye aur dekh lijiye theek hai na usko to mam aap panic kyu kar rahe hain jaise agar unki complaint aayi hai hamare paas meri team aapko khud call karegi
Customer: Nahi nahi panic nahi hu main to bas
Executive: Nahi mam aap bar bar mam aap bar bar alag alag logo ko call alag alag logo ko aap whatsapp kar rahi hai theek hai to you don't have to panic agar jo bhi problem hai aapko maine company ka naam bata diya hai theek hai aap ye samriddhi walon ka dekh lijiye apne record mein ja ke aur ye hai jo Shiv Shankar ki complaint chal rahi hai
Customer: Shiv Shankar wali to aap maine dekh li hai isliye main bol rahi hu waha se jo hai na clear kar dijiye ye cheez bol rahi hu
Executive: Mam ye Shiv Shankar wali jo lakh ki complaint thi iska pata hai aapko
Customer: Hello
Customer: Ji boliye
Customer: Hello madam ye Shiv Shankar wali complaint pata hai aapko
Customer: Kya
Executive: Hello ek minute mam
Executive: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says no response from IndiaMART.

- Wants complaints to be resolved quickly.

- Wants a screenshot of the complaint.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution through a dedicated team.

- Executive provided details of pending complaints.

- Executive shared details of Samriddhi Saroj Enterprises complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive team will call customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaints, resolution, follow-up, buyers
